name: RISING EVIL VR
description:
Rising Evil VR provides a stunning creepy Horror experience for free!

ATTENTION: If you have any heart or epilepsy problems do not play this evil game! Be warned.

You woke up in a room, alone, explore the building and try to find a way out.
But be warned, something is watching you...

The whole top horror game is playable just with your smartphone or optional in 3D Cardboard Virtual Reality!
One of the best vr horror games for your enjoyment!

- Amazing 3D High End Graphics
- Stunning Haunted Horror Atmosphere
- Spatial 3D Sound
- Optional 3D VR Cardboard & Bluetooth Gamepad Support

The Virtual Reality Cardboard mode guarantees terrifying adrenaline emotions like a rollercoaster ride. It is best to use headphones and a bluetooth gamepad.

Compatible with all VR Headsets:
- Cardboard
- Homido
- Freefly
- VR Box
- Virtual Vizor
...and many more!

New Features coming soon! (Tell us what you would like to play, we love feedback!)

Please vote for our app so that we will be adding more VR apps soon!
If you are experiencing any bugs feel free to contact us, we're still learning.
